mapper.insert: insert into messages (sender_id, sender_name, receiver_id, content, sender_avatar_path) values (#{senderId}, #{senderName}, #{receiverId}, #{content}, #{senderAvatarPath})
mapper.select: select id, sender_id as senderId, sender_name as senderName, receiver_id as receiverId, content, timestamp, sender_avatar_path as senderAvatarPath from messages order by timestamp desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
